import React from "react"; import { skills } from "../data"; import { AcademicCapIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import { faReact } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; // react import { faDatabase } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; // sql db import { faFire } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; // firebase import { faPython } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; // python import { faAndroid } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; // android import { faMicrosoft } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; // mfc import { faWindows } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; // c# import { faEdgeLegacy } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; // asp net import { faBootstrap } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; // bootstrap import { faGooglePay } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; // google play export default function Skills() { return (

ידע & כלים

{skills.map((skill) => (
Mountain

{skill.icon}

#photography #travel #winter
{skill.icon}
))}
); }
